name: Ambidextrous Weapon Training
description: Developing dexterity and control in both hands for fluid weapon switching, dual-wield combat, and balanced combat proficiency.

workout_groups.name: Fundamental Ambidextrous Drills
workout_groups.description: Building muscle memory and coordination to wield weapons in both hands equally.

workouts.name: Basic Hand-Switching Drill
workouts.description: Pass the weapon between hands while maintaining a balanced combat stance.

workouts.name: Mirror Striking Exercise
workouts.description: Perform identical strikes with each hand to build even-handed coordination.

workouts.name: Cross-Handed Weapon Flow
workouts.description: Switch from one hand to the other mid-strike while keeping fluid motion.

workouts.name: Off-Hand Precision Cuts
workouts.description: Train fine motor control by executing precise cutting motions with the non-dominant hand.

workout_groups.name: Weapon Transition & Multi-Hand Adaptation
workout_groups.description: Enhancing the ability to switch weapons and hands mid-combat.

workouts.name: Knife-to-Sword Swap Drill
workouts.description: Quickly transition between knife and sword, ensuring smooth weapon swaps.

workouts.name: Ambidextrous Reverse Grip Transition
workouts.description: Switch between forward and reverse grips in both hands while maintaining combat flow.

workouts.name: Dual-Wield Attack Timing
workouts.description: Execute dual-hand coordinated strikes, alternating between primary and secondary hands.

workouts.name: Live Ambidextrous Combat Flow
workouts.description: React to a sparring partner's movements while switching weapons between hands mid-engagement.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Bilateral Combat Mastery
workout_groups.description: Mastering full combat proficiency with both hands for ultimate versatility in battle.

workouts.name: Simultaneous Dual-Weapon Combat
workouts.description: Train precise control of independent weapon actions in both hands.

workouts.name: Blindfolded Off-Hand Combat
workouts.description: Develop fine motor control by using the non-dominant hand with restricted vision.

workouts.name: Synchronized Dual-Wield Attack Chains
workouts.description: Perform complex attack sequences using both weapons simultaneously.

workouts.name: Live Ambidextrous Sparring
workouts.description: Engage in a full-speed sparring session while being required to switch weapons and hands continuously.
